channel.title: Ursula & Nicolas on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Ursula & Nicolas on Home

item.title: News
item.description: What’s new to report? Our wedding planner will be replaced because of personal reasons - now Carolin Schönball is the person in charge. We trust Caro and if you have any questions you can contact her under c.schoenball[@]gmx.net. Event program: In case someone of you wishes to add an activity in the program, let Caro know so that she can keep the overview in sight and can help you in case you need something.

item.title: Information
item.description: The venue: Hofgut Heidesheim We will celebrate at the venue Hofgut Heidesheim, located in the beautiful wine region “Rheinland-Pfalz”, see map at the end of the page. Address: Heidesheimer Hauptstraße 10, 67283 Obrigheim (Rheinland-Pfalz), Germany https://hofgut-heidesheim.de/ Day and time We will celebrate on Saturday, the 20th of November 2021. Start will be at 2 pm. To be able to spend as much time as possible with you, we are also organizing an easy Sunday breakfast at the venue!

item.title: Time Table
item.description: Saturday 20.11.2021 2 pm Guest Arrival at the Location 2.30 pm Ceremony 3.30 pm Reception 6.30 pm Buffet Opening After PARTY Sunday 21.11.2021 9 am Breakfast and Come together

item.title: Corona
item.description: What we might have to consider Here we will update you about the latest news regarding Covid-19 restrictions etc. We indeed hope that we can celebrate with all of you. However, it might be that we have to restrict ourselves in terms of number of guests or other guidelines we have to consider. That means that we might be forced to reduce the number of guests in retrospect or must commit other changes to the plan.

item.title: RSVP
item.description: Please fill out the form to let us know if you are coming to the wedding! Wird geladen…

item.title: Contact
item.description: In case you have questions regarding the wedding or specific requests, please contact our best women/best men or our wedding planner. Ursula’s best women Annika and Liesbeth Trinler annika.trinler[at]mail.de, liesbeth-trinler[at]web.de Nicolas’ best men Sebastien Gomez and Yoann Long Wedding planner Carolin Schönball E-Mail: c.schoenball[@]gmx.net marrytale - Jennifer Schneider Mobil: 0171-2818549 E-Mail: info[at]marrytale.de https://marrytale.de/
